articles.description: The singer, 33, has accused Shia, 34, of physically assaulting her, sexual battery and infliction of emotional distress in a legal action she filed in December.
articles.content: FKA twigs shut down Gayle King over a sensitive question she asked amid their recent interview on CBS This Morning on Thursday, as to why she didn't leave Shia LaBeouf amid their allegedly abusive re… [+13547 chars]
